name: PixelVibe
description: An AI tool focused on generating pixel art game assets including characters, items, tiles, and UI elements. Ideal for indie game devs.

name: Scenario.gg
description: A model trainer where you can create consistent, style-aligned assets by training your own AI model with image prompts.

name: Leonardo.Ai
description: A powerful AI art generator with models for pixel art, fantasy items, characters, backgrounds, and more.

name: Artbreeder
description: A collaborative AI platform to generate faces, characters, and concept art using gene-style mixing.

name: Stable Diffusion - Pixel Art Model
description: An open-source diffusion model trained specifically for pixel art. Can be run locally or on platforms like HuggingFace.

name: Pixela.ai
description: A dedicated AI platform for generating and downloading pixel art sprites and tilesets.

name: Piffle
description: Generate downloadable sprites, props, and backgrounds with pixel-perfect style using prompt-based input.

name: Deep Dream Generator
description: Stylized image generator great for creating surreal or themed backgrounds for games and art.
